messages.message: I forgot my pw to IB running in localhost connected to my local database. Is there a way to reset the password without resetting my database? I've tried clicking the reset link from the log in page but I haven't got any email yet
Can you check your spam? It should be working... otherwise I can go in and reset your password for you from the admin app.
I did check my spam. To be clear, it is running on my localhost and connecting to my local database :cry:
Ohh I thought you meant on prod! Yeah can't help with that :disappointed: But your own team might know why the twilio emails aren't working
Thank you :slightly_smiling_face: I'll check with them
I think an admin user can reset a userâ€™s password - you can try that if you have an admin account. Or maybe creating a new admin account would work
Thanks, Aayush! Yea.. I only have one admin account...
Resolved. I ended up resetting my database. Was pretty quick to do so.
